column4: ok, someone said earlier that it was possible to install ubuntu to a sata drive, but have grub/bootloader start from a main ide drive..i have a sata add-in card, can't boot off of it.i got ubuntu installed to it, but now I can't boot anything, says GRUB Error

booted off the live cd, ran the grub-install on the main ide drive, it installed, also pointed it toward my mounted ubuntu install for the root directory, everything seemed to work until I rebooted, same error
